item.title: Dataverse Functions an introduction
item.description: Recently I had the opportunity to be on stage of European Power Platform Conference 2025 (EPPC25) in Vienna talking about Dataverse Functions (fka low-code instant plugins). With the subtitle; code less, do more! What are Dataverse Functions In the Power Platform you have different options to automate business logic, think off: business rules, workflows, actions, Power Automate, formulas, calculated columns and plugins. The plugins can be divided in to two different types: full-code and low-code plugins.
